name: faq-component-11
description: Split-layout FAQ section with grayscale image on the left and accordion questions on the right, featuring a two-column design with image and FAQ content in separate sections

files.content:
import { Accordion, AccordionContent, AccordionItem, AccordionTrigger } from '@/components/ui/accordion' import { Badge } from '@/components/ui/badge' type FAQs = { question: string answer: string }[] const FAQ = ({ faqItems }: { faqItems: FAQs }) => { return (
FAQ

Looking for answers?

{faqItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.question} {item.answer} ))}
) } export default FAQ
